entry.content: Image: Overkill/505 Games Those beat drops don‚Äôt come easy Whether you know Simon Viklund as the composer of the Payday franchise‚Äôs emblematic dubstep/EDM/techno soundtracks or as the voice of Bain in the same series, his name is always associated with heavy-hitter action games. He‚Äôs known for his work on Bandits: Phoenix Rising, Bionic Commando, Dead by Daylight, and of course, Payday: The Heist and Payday 2. For Polygon FM ‚Äî our weeklong look at the way music and gaming interweave with each ...

entry.content: Illustration: Jinhwa Jang/Polygon ‚ÄòIf I don‚Äôt hate myself after obsessively listening to my own music [...] then it can‚Äôt be that annoying‚Äô I enjoy games that make me think, which means I often find myself pausing ‚Äî not literally pressing pause, but simply staying still ‚Äî to consider what I need to do next.
